game.name: Demon Turf: Queens Edition
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The ultimate version of the 3D Platformer with attitude! Join Beebz on three seperate adventures to ultimately claim the Demon Queen title! Jump, spin and punch your way across the turfs with this Expressive Platformer!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The ultimate version of the 3D Platformer with attitude! Join Beebz on three seperate adventures to ultimately claim the Demon Queen title! Jump, spin and punch your way across the turfs with this Expressive Platformer!

reviewHighlights.text: Nope. This game just sucks. It's unfunny, EVERY character design sucks, checkpoint system sucks, movement sucks, combat system sucks, also most of lev...
